sys:positions.title: Party President for the district of Rasuwa

description: Bal Chandra Poudel is a Nepali politician affiliated with the Nepali Congress party. He served as the Party President for the district of Rasuwa for several decades, including from 2004 to 2008. Poudel is known for his significant participation in anti-panchayat movements and movements for civil rights in Nepal, including the People's Movements of 1990 and 2006. He spent much of his youth imprisoned for his political activities against the Panchayat regime and was also arrested during King Gyanendra's direct rule in 2005. He has contested several parliamentary elections representing Rasuwa.
short_description: Nepalese politician from the Nepali Congress party.
